Class Dissolve

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.BaseGameEntity

        • com.bham.bd.components.triggers.effects.Dissolve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtraInfo

    public class Dissolve
extends Trigger
    Represents effect of any image dissolving to particles

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dissolve

        public Dissolve(Point2D position,
                Image image,
                double angle)
        Constructs a dissolve effect by generating a particle array. Sets dissolve speed to 5 and pixel gap to 2 by default.
        Parameters:
        position - x and y coordinates of the top-left corner of the image position
        image - the image to be converted to particles
        angle - angle at which the image is rotated

      • Dissolve

        public Dissolve(Point2D position,
                Image image,
                double angle,
                double dissolveSpeed,
                int pixelGap)
        Alternate constructor allowing to set the speed of moving particles and the gap of pixels that can be skipped.
        Parameters:
        position - x and y coordinates of the top-left corner of the image position
        image - the image to be converted to particles
        angle - angle at which the image is rotated
        dissolveSpeed - how fast the particles will move away from the center
        pixelGap - number of pixels that will be skipped when each particle is generated

    • Method Detail

      • initParticles

        private void initParticles()
        Initializes particle array list

        This method loops through pixels of the provided image but skips some of them as defined by the PIXEL_GAP. Each color of the pixel (that is not transparent) is used to create a custom particle that will move away from the center on each update.

        public Shape getHitBox()
        Description copied from class: BaseGameEntity
        Gets the hit-box of the entity

        Hit-box is a shape with size and location properties. In most cases it is either a circle or a rectangle.

        Specified by:

        the shape of the hit-box

      • getHitBoxRadius

        public double getHitBoxRadius()
        Description copied from class: BaseGameEntity
        Gets the outer radius of the hit-box

        If it's a circle it gets its radius, if its any other shape, it gets the radius of the outer circle that would be generated around the hit-box.

        Specified by:
        getHitBoxRadius in class BaseGameEntity
        Returns:
        size of hit-box radius
